message: Let's start fair, I'll take most of the money this time, but you get a small share. We can work out a better split later!
Let's try a more even split this time, considering the inflation you'll face in the next rounds!
Let's try a 50/50 split this time. It's fair to both of us, and we can avoid the risk of further inflation.
Considering the inflation is only affecting you, I think this split is more reasonable. You should accept before the money loses more value!
I'm willing to compromise further to avoid further inflation. Let's split it 40/60 this time.
The inflation is really taking a toll on your share. I think this is a generous offer, considering the circumstances. You should take it before it's too late!
I'm willing to take a smaller share to avoid further losses due to inflation. Let's split it 30/70 this time.
